author: Baha'u'llah
source_text: تلک مدینة فیها سطعت رائحة الوصال وانجذب بها المخلصون إلی مقرّ القرب والقدس والجمال طوبی لقاصد قصد وفاز و شرب رحیق اللّقآء من بحر عنایة ربّه العزیز الحمید
translation: It is the city in which the sweet savors of reunion have breathed, which have caused the sincere lovers of God to draw nigh unto Him, and to gain access to the Habitation of holiness and beauty. Happy is the wayfarer that directeth his steps towards this city, that gaineth admittance into it, and quaffeth the wine of reunion, through the outpouring grace of his Lord, the Gracious, the All-Praised.
